UNION SELECT b1.id ,b1.UPLOAD_TIME,b1.filesName,b1.filesPath, b1.filesType,b1.fileSize,b1.authorId,b1.description,b1.playAmount,b1.commentAmount,b1.likeAmount,b1.attentionAmount, b1.duration,b1.title,b1.videoAddress,b1.categoryId,b1.status, m1.ID "userId",m1.USER_NICK_NAME,m1.USER_REAL_NAME,m1.HEADP_URL,m1.ATTENTION_TOTAL,m1.LIKE_TOTAL,m1.COMMENT_TOTAL from yuyue_upload_file_1 b1 left join yuyue_merchant m1 on b1.authorId = m1.ID
WHERE 1=1 and b1.filesType = 'video' ) total
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY total.UPLOAD_TIME DESC

SELECT total.* FROM ( SELECT b.id , UPLOAD_TIME,b.filesName,b.filesPath, b.filesType,b.fileSize,b.authorId,b.description,b.playAmount,b.commentAmount,b.likeAmount,b.attentionAmount, b.duration,b.title,b.videoAddress,b.categoryId,b.status, m.ID "userId",m.USER_NICK_NAME,m.USER_REAL_NAME,m.HEADP_URL,m.ATTENTION_TOTAL,m.LIKE_TOTAL,m.COMMENT_TOTAL from yuyue_upload_file_0 b left join yuyue_merchant m on b.authorId = m.ID
WHERE 1=1 and b.filesType = 'video'
UNION SELECT b1.id ,b1.UPLOAD_TIME,b1.filesName,b1.filesPath, b1.filesType,b1.fileSize,b1.authorId,b1.description,b1.playAmount,b1.commentAmount,b1.likeAmount,b1.attentionAmount, b1.duration,b1.title,b1.videoAddress,b1.categoryId,b1.status, m1.ID "userId",m1.USER_NICK_NAME,m1.USER_REAL_NAME,m1.HEADP_URL,m1.ATTENTION_TOTAL,m1.LIKE_TOTAL,m1.COMMENT_TOTAL from yuyue_upload_file_1 b1 left join yuyue_merchant m1 on b1.authorId = m1.ID
WHERE 1=1 and b1.filesType = 'video' ) total
WHERE 1=1
and total.id = #{id}
and total.categoryId = #{categoryId}
and CONCAT(total.USER_NICK_NAME) like concat('%', #{nickName}, '%')
and total.status = #{status}
and CONCAT(total.title) like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY total.UPLOAD_TIME DESC
